definitions.definition: A cool , refreshing state of the air ; coolness , duskiness , shade .
An artwork made by applying water - based pigment to wet or fresh lime mortar or plaster .
The technique used to make such an artwork.

main_definition: ( countable ) A cool , refreshing state of the air ; coolness , duskiness , shade .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , painting ) An artwork made by applying water - based pigment to wet or fresh lime mortar or plaster .
( uncountable , painting ) The technique used to make such an artwork.
